display_long_description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
[media]
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
[media]
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
display_long_description_unprocessed:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UYx-KdBr-ssQ7kNvwHvPKiU&_nc_oc=Adl3keiaPeeiEKVi1ukYaZ7X5TKP15WKZRhduLnPIKg5TO8KfHwKgSj-ZCpsZyWEOgU&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfNyIm4KLkSgPPskZPSERO5sIVQQHkfvVDMxK1Wzt8U_xw&oe=685BB94C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
